backend/main.mo: Defines comparison functions and data types for user profiles, recommendations, job listings, feedback, payments, and campaigns within the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level descriptions of various frontend source files including components, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point containing SEO metadata, social tags, performance hints, and root app mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with lazy-loaded sections, error boundaries, Vite env checks, and React Query setup.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard with access check, loading states, restricted access UI, and tabs for campaigns and Stripe config.
frontend/src/components/AdminOperational: Animated globe indicator showing operational status with visual effects when active.
frontend/src/components/AdminStripeConfi: Admin panel for configuring and verifying Stripe and Twilio settings, including keys, notifications, and test actions.
Interface for creating, editing, previewing, and managing campaigns with templates, triggers, and performance data.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, step navigation, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing hero section with animations, CTA tracking, and login-triggered onboarding flow.
frontend/src/components/InterviewSection: Interactive interview flow that collects user profile data, generates career recommendations, and displays mapped career images.
frontend/src/components/JobListingsSecti: Fetches and displays job listings, supports search filtering, and generates skill gap analysis for each job.
frontend/src/components/MarketingDashboa: Manages marketing platform configurations, displays campaign metrics, and shows active ad creatives and campaigns.
frontend/src/components/PaymentCancelPag: Handles payment cancellation state, triggers analytics events, and provides retry or home navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccessPa: Processes successful payment data, triggers multi-platform analytics events, and displays confirmation with continuation options.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders pricing plans and handles authenticated checkout with multiple analytics and tracking integrations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting for a name and saving a minimal user profile before closing.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationsS: Displays career recommendations with images and allows exploring related jobs.
frontend/src/components/SkillFusionSecti: Shows example career paths created by combining two skills with styled cards.
frontend/src/components/WaitlistModal.ts: Collects name and email for a waitlist, saves to localStorage, and triggers analytics events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Hook for extracting and storing UTM params and integrating multiple analytics services.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data via an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, animations, and accessibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, screens, animations, and components.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, known issues, and feature requests related to Stripe mode indicators, operational status UI, globe status icon, and auto-refreshing verification state.
